name: Homeship
description:
Did you ever dreamed of exploring space and its adventures when you were young? Use your skills, imagination and a lot of duct-tape to achieve your dreams. But beware! Grandmother's house-universe is dangerous and contains many precious fragile things. So navigate carefuly and be ready for on-flight construction. Don't forget the duct-tape!

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 during 48 hours.

The Team

Stopa (Programmer), Moutes (Programmer), Rozari (Graphics Designer), Shami42 (Graphics Designer/Programmer), Pozitreo (Programmer) 

Credits

We are really thankful to Tunetank and the authors for their wonderful music.
